attributes.action: Encourage British Students to Study medicine and denistry at university instead of employing foreign counterparts.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have three A grades at A level and applied to study medicine and, although i had much work experience and relevent qualifications,i got rejected from all 4 of my university choices. However when recently in Hammersmith Hospital, the Liverpool Royal and many GP surgeries, most Doctors barely speak enough english to communitcate and in stressful and personal situations, this is disgraceful, yet the elitist attitude of Universities towards people wishing to study medicine, and the priorities toward national students, it is no wonder the NHS is in disarray considering its not really represented by its own people!
